(OOC: Since no one responded to RebelYell's attack on
Oinker, I will start a new thing for RebelYell)
RebelYell was firing for all he was worth at any enemy
bot he could see. He was taking fire and shrapnel from
all sides. Just then, a shell hit the ground a few
feet in front of him,knocking him unconscious.
